author: Abiodun Oladokun
title: How Coinbase is drawing the attention of BTC institutional investors
text:
[]https://ambcrypto.com/bitcoin-as-new-entrants-climb-is-btc-ready-for-a-price-hike/ Bitcoin
How Coinbase is drawing the attention of BTC institutional investors
Share this article
- BTC’s Coinbase Premium Gap has increased since the year began.
- This shows that there is more demand for the coin on Coinbase than on Binance.
The first few days of 2024 have seen a surge of institutional interest in
[Bitcoin [BTC]]https://ambcrypto.com/search/btc on Coinbase, with the exchange’s Premium Gap reaching new highs, CryptoQuant analyst Maartunn noted in a new report.
BTC’s Coinbase Premium Gap compares the price at which the coin is traded on Coinbase to how much it is traded on Binance. When it rises, it means that investors are willing to pay a premium to acquire the coin on Coinbase.
According to Maartun:
“This premium fluctuates, ranging from a few dollars to exceeding $50, underscoring robust buying activity.”
This comes amid Binance’s recent troubles in the US and the global decline in its market share as a result.
Binance Vs Coinbase
AMBCrypto
reported earlier that at the beginning of 2023, Binance commanded a spot trading market share of 65%, while Coinbase trailed behind in a distant second with roughly 8.2%.
As regulatory pressure mounted on the exchange during the year, its market share plummeted by 20%, and by December, Binance’s market share had dropped to around 44%.
The recent rise in BTC’s Coinbase Premium Gap could be institutional investors aping in on the leading coin ahead of a potential spot ETF approval.
According to Maartun, the growth of this metric “has sparked speculation about whether MicroStrategy is acquiring additional Bitcoin or if these purchases are part of preparations for an ETF approval.”
A series of predictions surfaced in December 2023 that the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) would grant its first approval by 10th January.
However, a
https://ambcrypto.com/bitcoins-history-tells-us-that-a-spot-etf-approval-is-not-without-risks/ published by crypto investment services provider Matrixport on 3rd January stated that the regulator would reject all applications because they “fall short of a critical requirement that must be met.”
In recent news, Jacquelyn Meline, a senior reporter at TechCrunch, confirmed the possibility of approvals for “multiple firms’ applications” coming in very soon.
heard from sources extremely close to the matter that the bitcoin spot ETF is going to be approved by the SEC for *multiple* firms' applications
— Jacquelyn Melinek (@jacqmelinek)
[January 4, 2024]
Read
BTC’s Price Prediction 2023-24
That is not all
Apart from its Coinbase Premium Gap, BTC’s Coinbase Premium Index (CPI) has also trended upward since the year began. At 0.095 at press time, it has since risen by 2%, according to data from
CryptoQuant.
The CPI is a metric that measures the difference between the price of an asset on Coinbase and on Binance. When an asset’s CPI value is positive and in an uptrend, it indicates strong buying pressure among institutional investors on Coinbase.

author: PA News Agency
title: Yellow weather warning in place for rain and snow | Bucks Free Press
text: A yellow weather warning for rain and snow has been issued for much of Scotland on Saturday. The warning is in place from 8am until 3pm on Saturday and up to 25mm of rain is expected in lower levels of Scotland, according to the Met Office. A period of sleet and snow, turning to rain on Saturday, may lead to some flooding and travel disruption. Bus and train services may be affected, with journey times taking longer, with some spray and flooding on roads. Some interruption to power services is also likely. This week, Storm Gerrit caused travel disruption across the UK. Hundreds of homes in Scotland remain without power as the post-storm clean-up begins, but electricity bosses are “very confident” that the remaining properties will be reconnected on Friday. Travellers faced disruption across the rail network with operators urging passengers to check their journeys before setting off. Andy Page, Met Office chief forecaster, said: “Parts of the higher ground of Scotland may see temporary snow accumulations of 5-10cm (1-2in), while up to 25mm (just under 1in) of rain is expected in Wales, Northern Ireland and lower levels in Scotland. “Across Wales and southern England, wind gusts of 45-50mph are likely to be quite widespread, while gusts of 65-75mph are possible in the most exposed coastal areas.” Comments: Our rules We want our comments to be a lively and valuable part of our community - a place where readers can debate and engage with the most important local issues. The ability to comment on our stories is a privilege, not a right, however, and that privilege may be withdrawn if it is abused or misused. Please report any comments that break our rules. author: sina.com.cn
title: 宝盈新兴产业混合C净值上涨3.57%|宝盈_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
宝盈新兴产业灵活配置混合型证券投资基金（简称：宝盈新兴产业混合C，代码012815）公布4月23日最新净值，上涨3.57%。
宝盈新兴产业混合C成立于2021年7月2日，业绩比较基准为 收益率×65%+中证综合债券指数收益率×35%。该基金成立以来收益-8.92%，今年以来收益16.95%，近一月收益-0.55%，近一年收益13.72%，近三年收益10.09%。近一年，该基金排名同类1923/7823。
基金经理为王灏。王灏自2022年1月7日管理（或拟管理）该基金，任职期内收益-27%。
最新定期报告显示，该基金前十大重仓股如下：

author: Vogue Arabia
title: Celebrities Called for Gaza Ceasefire at With Pins
text:
From Billie Eilish to Mark Ruffalo, several stars walked the red carpet at the 2024 Oscars sporting red pins in an effort to expedite a Gaza ceasefire. Find out more below.
Photo: Instagram.com
Last night, Hollywood’s most famous faces gathered in California for the 2024 edition of the Academy Awards . The evening was replete with viral moments, from Ryan Gosling’s “I’m Just Ken” performance, to Billie Eilish and Finneas’s slowed down version of “What Was I Made For?” on stage. On the red carpet, however, what had many talking were the fiery red pins sported by the likes of Billie, Mark Ruffalo, Ramy Youssef, and Riz Ahmed, to name a few.
The meaning behind the red pins seen at Oscars 2024
In an effort to expedite a ceasefire in Gaza, celebrities wore red pins on the Oscars 2024 red carpet, which featured the symbol of a hand with a heart on its palm. The enamel red pin signified their dedication to Artists4Ceasefire, a group of almost 400 entertainment industry members who have signed an open letter to the president of the United States calling for an end to the dire situation in Gaza.
View this post on Instagram
A post shared by Vogue Arabia (@voguearabia)
Along with the celebrities who wore their pins proudly at the Academy Awards (the list also included Finneas, model Quannah Chasinghorse, and filmmaker Ava DuVernay), the Artists4Ceasefire open letter has also been signed by the likes of America Ferrera, Bradley Cooper, and Lupita Nyong’o, who also attended the Oscars, and Jessica Chastain, Cate Blanchett, Drake, Ben Affleck, and Jennifer Lopez.
Artists4Ceasefire pins: Where have they been spotted so far?
Prior to the Oscars, the red Artists4Ceasefire pins were also seen worn by the American indie supergroup Boygenius at the Grammy awards, by Dua Lipa at the pre-BAFTA celebrations, and by The Bear actor Ebon Moss-Bachrach at the SAG Awards.
Below, take a closer look at all the stars who wore the red pin and called for a ceasefire in Gaza last evening.
Finneas. Photo: Instagram.com
Ava DuVernay. Photo: Instagram.com
Billie Eilish. Photo: Instagram.com
Mark Ruffalo. Photo: Instagram.com
Quannah Chasinghorse. Photo: Instagram.com
Ramy Youssef. Photo: Instagram.com
Riz Ahmed. Photo: Instagram.com

author: Diego Figueroa Loayza
title: VER GOL Bolivia vs Venezuela: Ramiro Vaca anotó 1-0 golazo por Eliminatorias 2026 en la altura VIDEO | RPP Noticias
text: Ramiro Vaca sorprendió el arco de [Venezuela](https://rpp.pe/futbol/eliminatorias/bolivia-vs-venezuela-en-vivo-que-canal-transmite-en-directo-fecha-7-eliminatorias-2026-tigo-sports-y-venevision-en-vivo-partidos-de-hoy-noticia-1581264) y con un espectacular disparo de larga distancia puso en ventaja a [Bolivia ](https://rpp.pe/futbol/eliminatorias/bolivia-vs-venezuela-en-vivo-via-tigo-sports-y-venevision-en-directo-online-transmision-minuto-a-minuto-fecha-7-eliminatorias-2026-partidos-de-hoy-noticia-1581601?ref=rpp)en El Alto. [Bolivia y Venezuela](https://rpp.pe/futbol/eliminatorias/bolivia-vs-venezuela-en-vivo-via-tigo-sports-y-venevision-en-directo-online-transmision-minuto-a-minuto-fecha-7-eliminatorias-2026-partidos-de-hoy-noticia-1581601) se enfrentan este jueves en el Estadio Municipal de El Alto por la sétima fecha de las [Eliminatorias Sudamericanas 2026](https://rpp.pe/futbol/eliminatorias/tabla-de-posiciones-en-vivo-resultados-directo-eliminatorias-sudamericanas-2026-conmebol-peru-noticia-1504201), cotejo clave para ‘La Verde’ que busca recuperarse en su camino por llegar al Mundial y en el que logró ponerse adelante en el marcador gracias a un gol espectacular de Ramiro Vaca. Bolivia llegó al cotejo en el penúltimo puesto de la clasificación, frente a un rival ubicado dentro de la zona de clasificación directa. Para ‘La ‘Verde’ este encuentro es fundamental, por lo que optó por salir de su habitual localía en el Hernando Siles y llevó el mismo a El Alto, un estadio con una mayor altitud. El impacto se vio expresado de inmediato en Venezuela, que se encontró con dificultades para hacerle frente a los constantes ataques del cuadro local, hasta que Ramiro Vaca pudo mover el marcador. Golazo de Ramiro Vaca en Eliminatorias Sobre los 13’, ‘La Verde’ avanzó a campo rival por el costado derecho y llevó el esférico hasta el sector opuesto. Ahí controló Ramiro Vaca, quien logró perfilarse para su pierna derecha y con un potente disparo de pierna derecha, a más de 30 metros, batió la resistencia de Rafael Romo. El factor de la altura le dio una velocidad distinta al disparo de Ramiro Vaca, jugador del Bolívar y elemento esencial del mediocampo de ‘La Verde’ que con la llegada del técnico Óscar Villegas todavía sueña con seguir peleando por un lugar en el Mundial. Bolivia vs. Venezuela: así formaron en el partido Bolivia: Carlos Lampe; Diego Medina, Luis Haquin, Marcelo Suárez, Roberto Fernández; Robson Tome de Araujo, Ramiro Vaca, Henry Vaca, Carmelo Agarañaz; Lucas Chavez y Héctor Cuellar. Venezuela: Rafael Romo; Jon Aramburu, Nahuel Ferraresi, Yordan Osorio, Miguel Navarro; Jhon Murillo, Daniel Pereira, Telasco Segovia, José Martínez; Jhonder Cadiz y José Salomón Rondón. Te recomendamos ¿Qué necesita la Selección Peruana para clasificar al Mundial 2026? Ingresa tu pronóstico y mira la tabla en tiempo real. [](https://rpp.pe/calculadora-sudamericana-2026) Comparte esta noticia

author: Journal Du Token
title: Menaces quantiques contre Bitcoin : vitesse de minage et problèmes de sécurité Par Journal Du Token
text:
Les progrès de l’informatique quantique pourraient bientôt constituer un risque réel pour la sécurité et le processus d’exploitation minière de Bitcoin . Un rapport CryptoQuant a exploré comment des algorithmes quantiques avancés pourraient perturber le système de preuve de travail de Bitcoin. Le rapport a soulevé des inquiétudes quant à la résilience future du réseau. Le […]

author: Casa Editorial El Tiempo
title: Dorival Júnior, DT de Brasil, llenó de elogios a la Selección Colombia y a James Rodríguez: | Selección Colombia | Futbolred
text:
Durante la jornada del miércoles 19 de marzo, el técnico Dorival Júnior fue uno de los encargados en hablar con la prensa nacional e internacional.
El estratega fue sincero al mencionar que Colombia “propone” en la cancha y “busca jugar al fútbol”.
Así mismo, enfatizó que el combinado patrio "tiene muchas cualidades", debido a que "baja el balón y juega, busca desarrollar".
El estadio Mané Garrincha, en Brasilia, será testigo de una nueva edición entre la 'verdeamarela' y la 'tricolor.
Dorival sabe muy bien que Colombia “en todo momento buscará jugar”, por lo que deberán “tener cuidado y actitud para neutralizar lo máximo posible las posibles embestidas de nuestro adversario y confiar en la evolución de Brasil”.
Respecto al trabajo realizado por Néstor Lorenzo, el DT, afirmó que logró “una estructura bien definida” y ante esto, será “un partido muy complicado”.
“Es un equipo fuerte que también viene en un proceso de evolución, como el nuestro”, complementó el estratega brasileño.
Finalmente, hizo énfasis en James Rodríguez, quien es una de las principales figuras en el combinado 'cafetero'. “Combate y tiene buena salida del balón”, dijo Dorival respecto al '10'.

author: EIN News
title: Heritage Signs & Displays Wins Big at 2024 PICA Awards - Business News Today - EIN Presswire
text:
Heritage Signs & Displays Wins Big at 2024 PICA Awards
In a fiercely competitive field, Heritage earns 16 awards—led by its 2nd consecutive FujiFilm Best Wide Format Award for a lenticular event display.
CHARLOTTE, NC, UNITED STATES, April 16, 2025 /EINPresswire.com/ -- Heritage Signs & Displays (Heritage), a veteran-owned leader in branding workplace interiors and event environments, was recognized with multiple top honors at the 2024 Printing Industry of the Carolinas (PICA) Awards, held on Saturday, April 12, 2025, at the Hilton Charlotte Airport in Charlotte, North Carolina.
The PICA Awards reflect an industry-wide evaluation of technical and creative excellence across a wide range of categories. Entries are judged on visual quality, print precision, finishing, complexity, and overall execution. Notably, this marks the second consecutive year Heritage has received the prestigious Best Wide Format Award—an achievement that underscores the company’s consistent excellence and leadership in the category. It also reinforces Heritage’s continued role as a trusted provider of high-impact branding solutions for corporate interiors, trade associations, universities, and national events.
Established in 1966, the PICA Awards Competition is owned and managed by the Printing Industry of the Carolinas. The program continues to recognize companies that blend fine craftsmanship with cutting-edge technology to produce outstanding printed products. Winners are honored annually at the PICA Awards Banquet.
This year’s PICA Awards, now in its 59th year, drew over 500 entries from printing companies across North and South Carolina, celebrating innovation, craftsmanship, and excellence in print.
Heritage earned 16 total recognitions, including:
- 14 Best of Category Awards
- 1 Special Judges Award
- 1 FujiFilm Best Wide Format Award
The company’s FujiFilm Best Wide Format Award was presented for a free-standing lenticular event display project—a visually compelling piece that combined layered fabrication and motion-based design to deliver an immersive experience.
“This kind of result isn’t achieved by one person or one project, it’s the outcome of strong collaboration, daily discipline, and a unified commitment to excellence across the board,” said Dan Farnsworth, Director of Development at Heritage.
With growing operations across the Carolinas and the Mid-Atlantic, Heritage continues to deliver high-impact custom signs, environmental graphics, and engaging wall displays that elevate corporate interiors, campuses, and event venues alike. As a veteran-owned, faith-driven business, Heritage remains grounded in its mission: to honor God by serving others with excellence. This purpose fuels every project and reinforces Heritage’s role as a trusted partner for transformational branded environments throughout the Eastern United States.
“Our team is passionate about the work we do, and we’re committed to bringing imagination to life through collaborative and effective brand implementation,” said Joe Gass, President & CEO of Heritage. “Recognition like this affirms that the award-winning standard we hold ourselves to is making an impactful difference for our clients.”
About PICA
Since 1931, The Printing Industry of the Carolinas, Inc. (PICA) has been dedicated to advancing the success of the Carolinas’ printing and imaging industry. PICA provides training, resources, and advocacy on both state and national levels. The organization represents the graphic communications industry in North and South Carolina, where printing remains a vital economic driver. North Carolina consistently ranks among the top 20 print markets in the U.S. with over $3 billion in annual sales and 1,000+ establishments employing approximately 20,000 people. South Carolina ranks among the top 30 markets with over $1 billion in annual sales, 500 establishments, and 8,000+ industry employees. PICA is headquartered in Charlotte, NC. For more information, visit www.picanet.org.
About Heritage Signs & Displays
Heritage Signs & Displays specializes in the visual transformation of workplace interiors and event environments through exceptional project management, design, production, and sign installation services. In all aspects of its work, the company seeks to honor God by serving others with excellence. As a veteran-owned business, Heritage strives to be a valued resource and collaborative partner for clients’ needs across the Eastern United States.
Caleb Gass
Heritage Signs & Displays
Media@HeritageCustomSigns.com
